title: Wake up, Channel 4 – a TV show where women can win cosmetic surgery isn't entertainment
text:
With some TV programmes, you can imagine the original pitch all too easily. And so it is with Channel 4’s ‘controversial’ forthcoming show, The Surjury, which was presumably conceived as “Naked Attraction meets The Hunger Games.”

The idea is that participants will present themselves to a ‘jury’ of their peers, put forward a case for why they want cosmetic surgery, and allow these random strangers to decide whether they ‘win’ the chance to go under the knife. Of course, adds Channel 4, solemnly, “All contributors featured in the series have actively been seeking surgery of their own accord,” and “Duty of care to contributors is of paramount importance… they will be psychologically assessed...”...
description: With some TV programmes, you can imagine the original pitch all too easily.
